data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The choice of Cellular::Automata::Wolfram had several alternatives.
    The first was Wolfram, but that is too general given everything Dr.
    Wolfram has accomplished. CAW was another option, but it wouldn't be
    self-documenting.

    Math::Wolfram was another possiblity, but given how much non
    automata mathematics Wolfram has produced, it was too general again.
    Game::Life is close, but this is not a game and Game::Wolfram seemed
    unclear.
